## Vector3.(constructor)

Creates a new Vector3 initialized with values in an array.

**Signature:**

```typescript
constructor(elements: number[]);
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  elements | number\[\] | Array that contains the x, y, z values. |
